abstract: The MyCityWay apps are comprehensive travel, reference and city-service guides wrapped into one.
snippet: The MyCityWay apps are comprehensive travel, reference and city-service guides wrapped into one.
lead_paragraph: Part city guide, part virtual dashboard, MyCityWay aggregates useful information into one convenient place: your mobile device. Available for more than 40 markets around the globe, each app is a comprehensive travel, reference and city-service guide wrapped into one. The free apps are available for iPhone, Android and Blackberry.
